effect.scarlet-violet: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user’s Special Attack by two stages.
effect.the-teal-mask: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user’s Special Attack by two stages.
effect.the-indigo-disk: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user’s Special Attack by two stages.

short_effect.scarlet-violet: Lowers the user’s Special Attack by two stages after inflicting damage.
short_effect.the-teal-mask: Lowers the user’s Special Attack by two stages after inflicting damage.
short_effect.the-indigo-disk: Lowers the user’s Special Attack by two stages after inflicting damage.

flavor_text.scarlet-violet: The user whips up a storm of leaves around the target. The recoil from this move harshly lowers the user's Sp. Atk stat.
